content.title: SERB - POWER Fellowship
content.details: The SERB Power Fellowship is designed for outstanding women researchers and innovators working in Indian academic institutions and R&D laboratories, holding Ph.D. degrees in any branch of science and engineering.
benefits: Fellowship of ₹15,000/- per month in addition to regular income
Research grant of ₹10 lakhs per annum
eligibility: Must hold a Ph.D. degree in any branch of science and engineering
Must be an active scientist with an excellent record of research performance
Must be in regular service throughout the duration of the Fellowship
Age limit: 35-55 years at the time of submission of proposal
exclusions: Cannot avail another fellowship from government sources at the same time
Successful POWER Fellows cannot be nominated for a second time
content.application_process: Nominations for the SERB Power Fellowship are accepted throughout the year through the online portal only (www.serbonline.in).
documents_required: Nominations from Heads of Institutions or Fellows of National academies

faqs.question: Is there any age limit for PI to be eligible for the award?
faqs.answer: PI should be within 35-55 years at the time of submission of proposal.

faqs.question: I am already availing another Fellowship. Am I eligible for SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: No, you can avail only one fellowship at a time from government source.

faqs.question: Is the Fellowship received under SERB Power Fellowship taxable?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Fellowship received under SERB Power Fellowship is taxable as per I.T. rules.

faqs.question: What are the areas covered under SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: All Areas of Science (in the broadest terms) are covered by this Fellowship.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: The SERB Power Fellowship duration is for 3 years only, without any possibility of extension.

faqs.question: How many times a person can avail SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: A person can avail SERB Power Fellowship only once.

faqs.question: When can a person apply for the SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: Nominations are accepted throughout the year through online portal only.

faqs.question: Who can nominate for SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: Heads of Institutions or Fellows of National academies can send the nominations.

faqs.question: Can a fellow change the host institute during implementation of SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: Yes, a SERB Power fellow can change the host institute during implementation.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria of POWER Fellowship?
faqs.answer: Selection of POWER Fellows will be made twice a year by a specially constituted Search-cum-Selection Committee.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for a SERB Power Fellowship?
faqs.answer: An applicant will fill the application form on the online portal, and the nominator will verify and forward the nomination.
